biography_text: ROSEN, Jacklyn Sheryl, a Senator and a Representative from Nevada; born in Chicago, Cook County, Ill., August 2, 1957; B.A., University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minn., 1979; computer software developer; business owner; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-January 3, 2019); was not a candidate for reelection to the House of Representatives but was elected as a Democrat to the United States Senate in 2018 for the term ending January 3, 2025.
